body_html: Yeah, I solved it by using shape as argument in initializer and moving the initializer outside the condition and discarding the shape argument from tf.get_variable. It is to be noted that the same Tensor can be passed as a shape argument to initializer, though.
body_text: Yeah, I solved it by using shape as argument in initializer and moving the initializer outside the condition and discarding the shape argument from tf.get_variable. It is to be noted that the same Tensor can be passed as a shape argument to initializer, though.
body: Yeah, I solved it by using `shape` as argument in initializer and moving the initializer outside the condition and discarding the shape argument from `tf.get_variable`. It is to be noted that the same Tensor can be passed as a `shape` argument to initializer, though.
